review: Its OK. Despite having a nice ASUS router and putting the said router in close proximity to the device casting the feed and the TV, there is lag.  Would probably have not gone with this item if I had known this was a issue.

review: I don't recommend chrome cast to ISO users, it's not worth the money or your frustration. We have had it for 3 months every time I turn it on I have to reset my router. We finally went out and bought the Apple TV it may cost a little bit more but it's worth every penny. Now I can watch my programs with no frustrations.
